components.label: formatting information
components.value:
Captcha preharvest task routines follow a certain pattern:
Must be either "daily" / "weekly" / "monthly" or "every (2-6) day/week/month(s)".
Note that it is case insensitive. Examples for valid inputs:
"every 3 days"
"weekly"
"every month" (equal to monthly)

Note that all those schedules take effect after the first execution specified by the delay provided earlier.
If you want to execute preharvest schedules more frequently than daily, consider using multiple captcha preharvest tasks.
